bonuses.desc: Increases Lightning DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
When the wearer uses their Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
Increases Physical DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).
Increases Wind DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
Increases Fire DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for the next attack.
Increases Quantum DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> DEF.
Reduces DMG taken by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, restores HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of their Max HP and regenerates <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> Energy.
Increases Ice DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
Increases DEF by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the Shield created by the wearer by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
ATK increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
The wearer's SPD increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> and Basic ATK DMG increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.
Increases Outgoing Healing by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates 1 Skill Point.
Increases Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> Energy.
Increases Imaginary DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, and their CRIT DMG increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> against Imprisoned enemies.
Increases the wearer's DEF by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> or higher, the wearer gains an extra <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> DEF.

Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> until the end of their first attack.
Increases the wearer's Max HP by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> or higher, all allies' ATK increases by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.
Increases the wearer's ATK by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.

Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> immediately upon entering battle.

Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. When the wearer's SPD reaches <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak>.
